General.Name: Ping An Healthcare and Technology Company Ltd
General.Description: Ping An Healthcare and Technology Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates an online healthcare services platform in China. The company offers online medical services, such as online consultation, hospital referral and appointment, inpatient arrangement, and second opinion services; prepaid cards and health check-up services; and medical devices. It provides advertising, wellness management, and health management services. Further, the company provides medicine marketing services; technology services; application development and operation services; and hospital and clinic services, as well as operates an insurance agency. Ping An Healthcare and Technology Company Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Shanghai Ping An Building, Shanghai, China

3.Name: Mr. Cheng  Liu
